mapper.insert: insert into wa_order_vehicle (order_id, zorder_id, vehicle_no, vehicle_hanging_no, vehicle_size, vehicle_actual_size, driver_name, driver_phone, receive_actual_date, deliver_actual_date, receive_except_date) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{zorderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{vehicleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleHangingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vehicleActualSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveActualDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliverActualDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receiveExceptDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
